message:
I'm 17-year-old guy 
I wanna start to learn coding and programming and I'm fond of designing mobile phones apps for iOS and android especially android .. Which language should I start with? or what are the best online course should I take ?

data.message: I strongly recommend to start with CodeMasry.com, start from the beginning that would be the fundamental for what ever you decide later. This course will learn you how to think, it's clone of Alexandria university, engineering faculty computer science department materials for the first two years. Course is in Jave, but please move in courses one after one and allocate min 2 hours daily 5 days/week. All The best wishes

الافضل انك تبتدي ب cs50 بحيث انك تعرف اساسيات كل حاجه في الكمبيوتر و بعد كدا هتقدر تقرر بشكل احسن انت عايز تتخص في ايه .
الكورس ده من هارفرد و تقدر تلاقيه علي اليوتيوب و الافضل تشتغل عليه من موقع edx
Learn Javascript. You would be able to build for Web, Desktop (using electron) and even native Mobile using nativescript.

Do you have a MacBook? If no, then you can't do iOS development in a conventional way. If yes, you need to learn either Objective-C or Swift, then you can go ahead learn the iOS SDK and start writing iOS apps.

If you want to do Android apps, it's a similar fashion; you'll have to learn either Java or Kotlin, but the consensus is that Java is far superior for now, then working with the Android SDK to write android apps.

In both cases, you have to make sure you understand the OOP paradigms and how you can use them in the language you chose.

Now what courses/books you might need is going to vary based on your experience--do you have any CS background? Have you studied any programming before?
